Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Company.of.Heroes.2.Master.Collection-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-company.of.heroes.2.master.collection.iso (30,651,678,720 bytes)
  • Update to v4.0.0.21748 installed over (6.6 GB), thanks to Christsnatcher!
  • Some commanders, units and bulletings can be activated in Skirmish MP mode
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can download and install any number of language packs and then switch between them if you like
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 35.1 GB to 17~24.5 GB, depending on selected languages)
  • Installation takes: ~20 minutes on 8-cores CPU + SSD; ~35 minutes on 4-cores CPU + SSD; ~50 minutes on 4-cores CPU + HDD; ~1.5 hour on 2-cores CPU + HDD
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 40.3 GB (depending on selected languages)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

Game Description

Powered by the Essence Engine 3.0, the Company of Heroes 2 series feature some unique mechanics rewarding thoughtful players. From the TrueSight™ system that emulates the units’ line of sight to the cover-system that encourages clever unit placement – not to mention the combined arms approach and the hard and soft counters gameplay that will make you think twice before trying to destroy a tank with a simple squad of riflemen – each game presents players with an uninterrupted stream of meaningful tactical choices that can turn the tide of war.

Included Content

  • Company of Heroes 2 (base game)
  • Company of Heroes 2: Ardennes Assault
  • Company of Heroes 2: Case Blue Mission Pack
  • Company of Heroes 2: Southern Fronts Mission Pack
  • Company of Heroes 2: The British Forces
  • Company of Heroes 2: The Western Front Armies: Oberkommando West
  • Company of Heroes 2: The Western Front Armies: US Forces

You can skip downloading of speech files you don’t need. Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin (also MUST BE installed by Italian and Czech users)
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-04).

Unfortunately the game doesn’t allow you to play in one GUI language combined with another speech pack (it works Czech and Italian only, by design).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous CoH2 repack.
